text: William Hopkins Folwell (October 26, 1924 â€“ February 7, 2022) was an American Episcopal prelate. He was the Bishop of Central Florida from 1970 until 1989. He was made a deacon in 1952. Folwell was born in Port Washington, New York. Folwell died on February 7, 2022 at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Episcopalian bishops Category:People from New York (state) Category:People from Orlando, Florida
title: William H. Folwell
